resources.string: Come back tomorrow and thank again!
Invite your friends by thanking them!
Please give a reason for thanking! :)
Thank you for giving a reason!
You have no common thanks yet
We\'d like to request your location, in order to make sure we collect the correct places from the Thanks generated! :)
Top 10 of Thanks Given to Other Profiles
You will earn 10 Thankers when your friend registers!
You may add a reason for your Thanks!
has joined so you earn 10 Thankers!

Because you've thanked people more than10 times (or multiples of 10 times), we have awarded you 10 Thankers.
Use these Thankers to give more special Thanks to your friends and favourite profiles!

Gladly,
Your Thanker team!

As you've thanked 100 times (or in a multiple number of 100), we've awarded you 100 Thankers.
This is worth, for example, a Mega Thanks!
Use these special Thanks to specially thank your friends and favourite pages!

Specially thankful to you, as well,
Your Thanker team!

To thank is to make every moment more special. It is to appreciate it, more fully.
And because you've thanked 1000 times or more (in a multiple of 1000), we've also awarded you 1000 Thankers!
You can Power Thank, give more Mega Thanks, or just as you like to Thank!
Use Special Thanks to apply more meaning in what you're thanking for.
Go thank your friends and favourites profiles!

Here thanking you,
Your Thanker team!

A <font color='#28a9e0'>Super Thanks</font> is worth <font color='#FFC107'>10</font> Thanks.
You must be, or must have done something special here.
Glad to see you're being appreciated!

Appreciating you,
Your Thanker team!

A <font color='#1d7ba3'>Mega Thanks</font> is worth <font color='#1976D2'>100</font> Thanks.
It's a sign of really high appreciation. You're spreading your magic, we see. It is highly advised that keep on just doing that!

Yours truly,
Your Thanker team!

<font color='#165e7d'>Power Thanks</font>gt; are as <font color='#673AB7'>power</font>ful as it gets! Being worth <font color='#673AB7'>1000</font> Thanks, it means someone just spent some valuable Thankers amount to show how much you're appreciated! You must be doing something really well! Don't be surprised if we come to you someday, asking for some advice.
Please keep being powerfully that way, and embrace that same Power you're receiving!
Let it be some boost for your own Thanking activity, as well ;)n
Our best to you, and our best to your actions,
Your Thanker team!

You have been gifted the very rare<font color='#4B0082'>Ultra Thanks</font>gt;!
Some people don't even know that Ultra Thanks exist. But here you are, making living proof of it!
This means that something that you did, or do, or a portrait of what you are and represent, is truly and significantly important to who Ultra Thanked you.
May These Ultra vibes also inspire you to look for the Thankful moments in your everyday. We know you're making it easier to find in others' lives.

Ultra happy for you,

\Your Thanker Team!
You have been thanked in Thanker!\nThanker is where people show their appreciation for everything, and get happier and happier!\nIn this case, you have been thanked by
" Join now, thank your friends, and start appreciating life even more! Looking forward to seeing you in! Yours truly, Your Thanker team!"
Thanker is a platform where you can thank your friends, and favourite pages!
Join now and know that by appreciating things more, you\'ll also get even happier!
Find our app in your App Store!
Seeing you on the brighter side,
to be a part of it!

Gratitude is one of the most important foundations of Happinness. And we want you to use Thanker in order to experience it more!
According to the studies we've analyzed, expressing Gratitude to the person who enabled it, makes the Happy stimulus even stronger. And hence creating Thanker!
And who doesn't like to Thank, where thanking is due? :)
Get your Gratitude on! Create a positive impact around you! Create a great experience for you!
Also, feel free to reach out to us through the "Contact Us" option in the Menu.
Hope you have an amazing experience with Thanker!

Thanking alongside, and thanking you!
Your Thanker Team!
%s is on your 10 Top Thankers list!

%s is now on the Top 10 of users who mostly appreciate you!
Just keep on giving reasons to be thanked for!

Yours truly,
Your Thanker team!

User %s has entered the Top 10 of profiles who thank you the most!
Maybe there's even a race for people to enter these rankings of yours! ;)
Wishing you always the very best.

Always on the bright side, by your side,
Your Thanker Team!

You have news regarding your Top 10 of Thankers!
%s has just entered it, and for the looks of it, this profile will just keep on wanting to climb it!
Don't forget to thank what you appreciate, as well. Remember, thanking stimulates your happiness!

Seeing you on the happy side, seeing you on the grateful side
Your Thanker Team!

There are some good rankings out there, and your Top 10 of Thankers is surely one of them! Who shares this opinion is %s, who's just entered your Top 10!
This is great news!
Hope this brings as much goodness to you, as it is bringing to %s!

Looking towards the bright side, the thankful one,
Your Thanker Team!

We're sure that to many users, you're a song that really sounds great to the ear, and brightens up days! We believe that this is what %s thinks, as this profile has just entered the Top 10 of people who thank you the most!
This tells us that you're doing something great, for sure.
Now go and give your appreciations, too. It will only make you even happier!

Looking forward to your thanking,
Your Thanker Team!
You\'ve made the 10 Top Thankers list of %s!

You have entered the Top 10 of %s's list of Thankers!
Needless to say, you make this world round and round. You're appreciating %s and bringing more happiness to you, by practicing your Gratitude! Well done!

Yours truly, appreciating that Top,
Your Thanker team!

It is with pleasure that we say you are now on the Top 10 of %s's Thankers.
Oh, we are proud!
Keep on strengthtening those bonds. Keep on Thanking what you appreciate, and bringing in that valuable feeling!

Yours truly, and feeling good,
Your Thanker Team!

We're sure %s is greatly happy for that you are now on the Top 10 of this profile's Thankers!
We Thank you also, for the time you take for thanking.
Thanking does make good to oneself.

Seeing you always on the bright side, and one with you and all this experience,
Your Thanker Team!

Well, hello!
Great seeing you now on %s's Top 10 Thankers!
It is commonly said that we take care of what we appreciate, and that does surely sounds good to us.
Thank you for thanking, and thank yourself for appreciating what makes you happy, what brings gratefulness to your life.

Yours always, and thanking the thanking, of course,
Your Thanker Team!

Aaaaand.. you're in %s's Top 10! And we do appreciate your appreciation!
Thanking often comes after effort and commitment, from the lightest to the heaviest ways (in the best sense of these). We believe that experiencing Gratitude from our efforts is what allows us to feel it more fully, in a more complete and fulfilling way!

Seeing you here, thaking your efforts and presence,
Your Thanker Team!
Gui and Diogo from Thanker thank you for joining us! We hope you have a blast, and that this is useful for you!

Thank People: for each Thanks, you\'ll earn 1 Thanker
Thank in multiples: everytime your thanks count reaches a multiple 10, 100 or 1000, you\'ll earn that same multiple in bonus
Watch a Rewarded Video: watch a Reward Video on the Options, and earn 10 Thankers each time!
Subscribe to Premium: it will give you 150 Thankers each day, everyday!

You will be able to give more Special Thanks, according to how much gratitude you feel about something. You\'ll need to spend the Thankers you\'ve earned, in order to give these Special Thanks.
The Special Thanks are: Super, Mega, and Power. And might there be any another one...?
You need to have 10 Thankers to give 1 Super Thanks.\nOne Super Thanks is also worth 10 Thanks.
You need to have 100 Thankers to give 1 Mega Thanks.\nOne Mega Thanks is also worth 100 Thanks.
You need to have 1000 Thankers to give 1 Power Thanks.\nOne Power Thanks is also worth 1000 Thanks.
To express and feel Gratitude are one of the most foundations of Happinness, while you\'re also reckoning value in others.\nUse Thanker to experience Gratitude more! ;)
Thanks in the last Five days
The other person has to click the Thank button, too! :)\nGet your phones closer ;)
Want to earn 100 Thankers a day? Subscribe now our Premium, and gain the ability of giving more Special Thanks!

We\'d like to know where, exactly, the Thanksa re being given. Can we activate the Location feature?

Your appreciation has been noticed and welcomed by %s.
Very good ;)
We do say, keep it up with the Thanking!
Experience more what's genuinely good for you!

Sinceerely,
Your Thanker Team!
Your feedback was sent!\nLooking forward to giving you some feedback whenever suitable ;)\nThank you!

Because life is better when we appreciate it...

Hi!
%s has joined Thanker!
How about you go to your friend's profile and do some Thanking?!

Always on that bright side of yours, having you on our bright side,
Your Thanker team!
Start thanking so you see your thanking list here! What do you feel grateful for, today? ;)

Add some friends, or accept requests! Friends make it to the top of what Thanker feels mostly grateful for! ;)

Privacy Policy


Guilherme Amoroso Romão built the Thanker app as a Freemium app. This SERVICE is provided by Guilherme Amoroso Romão at no cost and is intended for use as is.

This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.

If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at Thanker unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

Information Collection and Use
For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to Name, Birthday, Living country, Phone number (for when the user is invited via SMS). The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way.

The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.

Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app
Google Play Services
Firebase Crashlytics

Log Data
I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (\"IP\") address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

Cookies
Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device\'s internal memory.

This Service does not use these \"cookies\" explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use \"cookies\" to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.

Service Providers
I may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
To facilitate our Service;
To provide the Service on our behalf;
To perform Service-related services; or
To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Security
I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Links to Other Sites
This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

Changes to This Privacy Policy
I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

This policy is effective as of 2020-04-30

Contact Us
If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at themakersplatforms@gmail.com.

This privacy policy page was created at privacypolicytemplate.net and modified/generated by App Privacy Policy Generator
By creating an account you accept our Privacy Policy (click to read)
You may update your account details!
Are you sure you want to delete your Thanker Account?
Do you really want to delete your Thanker Account?
We thank you for the time you spent using Thanker!
To get your account back ;)\nDo you want it back?

We're thrilled to have you back, %s!
Thanking surely is something worth doing. And we do appreciate having you with us again, for the thanking purposes and everything you can achieve here.
What do you feel it could get better from your last experience? Message us through the app, in the "Contact us" option! Hoping this time you do have a great experience.
And what do you feel grateful for today?
Get your thanking on!

See you brighter than ever, %s!
Your Thanker Team
Come back tomorrow to collect more Thankers!!!

Due to being a Premium member of Thanker, you have collected %d Thankers today!
Use them to give higher value Thanks to everyone you like!
Keep in mind that Thanking is a process where the more you give, the more you get. Do it to experience Gratitude more (which is the feeling that smilingly values what we have), and to do some reckongnition, of course! See it for yourself!

Seeing you on the bright side, and may the thankful side always be with us,!
Your Thanker team :)
If you choose \"Yes\", you\'ll pick up your account from where it was.\nOr if you choose \"No\", you\'ll start a new account.\nChoose wisely, and also thankfully ;)
Would you also like to have the abilities of:
Giving \"You\'re welcome\"s to the Thanks you receive
Earn Thankers everyday, that will allow you to give more special Thanks quicker, and also have the ability of appreciating the Thanks you receive, for 5€/month!

Hello! You have been %s on Thanker by %s, who wants you to be a part of it! Thanker is a platform where you can Thank your friends and pretty much whoever you mostly appreciate. Thanking is known for increasing happinness, and developing several parts of our lives, positively. Download the app on the App Store, and see it for yourself! ;) We\'ll be seeing you on the brighter side! Best, Your Thanker Team! https://www.thanker.co
You can invite your friends via e-mail or SMS, and thank that at the same time. When they register, you\'ll receive 50 Thankers (the equivalent to 5 Super Thanks) for each.
Your payment was approved! You are now a Premium subscriber of Thanker! Happy thanking ;)
When your Thanker status is True Thanker, you\'ll receive two (2) Thankers for every time you Thank (instead of 1).
When your Thanker status is Master Thanker, you\'ll receive three (3) Thankers for every time you Thank
Famous Users That Thank to these Categories!
Live the Life You\'re Grateful For
This sign means that the Thanks was welcomed!\nYou can say \"You\'re Welcome\" by subscribing Premium (which will also provide you with daily effortless Thankers)!
This is where your friends\' most recent interaction will appear!
Add a message to your Thanks!
You need to have at least 1000 Thankers to give a Power Thanks!
You need at least 100 Thankers to give one Mega Thanks!
You need at least 10 Thankers to give one Super Thanks!
Thanks is where the heart is
one thanking a day... well, it\'s cool for you
when i say thanks, you say welcome
it\'s a thanks made in heaven
It\'s been a thanking day\'s night
Ooh, gratitude is a place on Earth
Earn 150 Thankers per day, everyday!\nBe able to give Special Thanks more often!
Have the ability of saying \"You\'re Welcome\" to those who thank you!\nPlus, have more highlight in your friends\' Thanks pages!

Thankers are the currency that will let enable you to give Special Thanks. Every time you thank, you earn 1 Thanker! There are other ways of earning more Thankers, such as reaching multiples of 10, 100 and 1000 in the Thanks Count, inviting Friends, being Premium, and watching Videos form our sponsors!

Thanks Count lets you keep track of how many Thanks you\'re giving to other profiles. Also, everytime you have thanked, in a multiple number of 10, 100, or 1000 thanks, you\'ll receive that same amount in Thankers (as a bonus). For example, when you reach a Thanks Count of 10, you\'ll receive 1 Thanker plus 10. When you reach a Thanks Count of 20, you\'ll receive 1 Thanker plus 10. When you reach 100 of Thanks Count, you\'ll receive 1 Thanker, plus 10, plus 100!
Have even better prices upon (timely) renewals!\nAnd receive 5 extra Thankers per day, everyday, for every consecutive renewal of your subscription!
Earn 50 Thankers when your friend registers!
Thank and Invite!\nEarn 50 Thankers when friends register!
Your Thanker Level is determined by how much you thank in Thanker (last 5 days ratio). When you reach the Top Levels, you earn more Thankers for every time you thank another profile!
Click the picture to load a new profile picture!
Select at least one plan to buy! :)

We're going to be opened with you: Premium is a better place with you in it. We totally guarantee it.
Make sure you appreciate with the same intensity as you feel it, and do use it to create more value around you.
We thank you again, for being a warmer part of Thanker!

Truly yours,
Your Thanker Team!

PS: Your current subscription is live until %s

To us you're always Premium, no matter what.
The difference, now, is that you've actually unlocked some more special benefits in Thanker: talk about 150 Thankers a day, effortlessly, and being able to say "You're Welcome" to the people who thank you.
You now have more useful tools to give special Thanks more frequently, and doing the effort to acknowledge those who appreciate you.
Let's invest on our gratefulness. Let's be all we can be!

Yours forever, and with you at all times,
Your Thanker Team!
Connect to the internet, and connected you shall be!
Wishing you a wonderful day! Thrilling to be by your side. Your Thanker Team ;)
Happy birthday! Thank you for spending some time with us in this special day!
It\'s my birthday, and I thank if I want to!
Good times, baby! Enjoy this day! Happy birthday!
It\'s your Bi-birth-b-birthday! Hit it, DJ!

Thanking is a beautiful thing!
And with that, Gratitude is one of the main foundations of one\'s happiness.
That\'s where Thanker comes in. We enable people to thank each other more, building up on the stimulus that will enhance their happinness
So download the app and join us! Thank those who you to the most!
Appreciating your visit! We\'ll see you soon!/span>
;
Download Thanker
;
;

Renew: if you appreciate getting free Thankers everyday; if you enjoy having the ability of saying you\'re welcome; if you\'re totally amazing! We\'re getting close to the expiration date of the Premium. Go to your Premium page, and choose one of our Extension plans! Appreciate it!

How does Thanking make you feel?
What do you reckon everytime you give a new thanks? Is it being an enabling experience for you?
Let us know, through the Contact Form in the Options menu!

By your side everytime, happily thanking also,
Your Thanker Team

We'd like to keep on following up on your Thanking journey.
As you may know by now, Thanking is a happiness enabling experience, since practicing Gratitude allows the good things (and more of it) to be reckoned. It helps you appreciate, while you're also showing the right person your appreciation . It's a win-win!
Would you like to share some of your experiences with us? We'd surely like to know, and we're reachable through the Contact Form, in the Options menu!

See you soon, and listening to you,
Your Thanker Team

We'd love to hear from you!
Share your Thanking experience with us!
How do you feel about Thanking? Do you see any changes on the way you see life, and even more, on the way you appeciate life? We're eager to know.
Tell us everything, in the Contact form, inside Options menu.

Looking forward to it,
Your Thanker Team!
Thank someone near you!\nYour friend must also click the \"Thank Near\" button.\nGet your devices closer ;)
Start giving some thanks so you\'ll have your dream top, here!
Start spreading some of your magic, so you\'ll have a whole top of people giving you the Thanks!
Something tell us that user %s is about to become a hardcore Thanker. Stay tuned for this list of Thanks ;)
How are you experiencing Thanking?\nAlso, we\'d like to know your suggestions and feedback.\nThank you for this, and see you soon!
You have currently %d available Thankers!\nAfter this Thanks, you\'ll have %d!
Are you sure you want to leave this screen without saving?
Thanker: practice Gratitude, and show some love! ;)

Congrats!
You're now a Walker Thanker!
This means you're pretty much now walking the path of the Grateful ones.
Keep it up. Connect, praise, reckon value, and bring that value to your own life. Walk the life of the greats! Walk the life you're Thankful for!

Seeing you always, and surely walking by your side,
Your Thanker Team!

Yeah! Your level is now "Explorer Thanker".
This means you're exploring the wonders of having a more Grateful life.
What thoughts do you have on finding the gratefulness in your it? And how are your social life connections responding to the thanking you send them?
Most importantly, make sure that the Gratefulness experience, brings your the true Gratitude feeling. So keep on exploring. Thank the world, thank your challenges, thank your successes, and thank yourself.

Thanking you always,
Your Thanker team!

Congrats!
You've become a True Thanker!
You have decided to truly appreciate and build on that feeling.
You're most probably now being able to truly and more oftenly connect to what brings you joy in your everyday, to what gets you closer to who you are, and what you really want to achieve.
Find in Gratefulness the true path to what truly makes you great. Let Thanking be a guide!
Also, now for every Thanks you give, you get 2 Thankers ;)

Truly yours,
Your Thanker Team!

Master!
This is what you are!
You're taking the daily time to discover and reckon what you are grateful for. And although we say we thank you for that, you probably know that you're already feeling blessed with so much to thank for, all around you!
There's so much to be appreciated, and that make us feel good, learn, and develop, right?
 And now, for every Thanks you give, you get 3 Thankers.
That's right. We believe that the more we give, the more we get.
Master the world. Master yourself. Master your abilities. Master your purpose. Master Thanker!

Mastering alongside, and mastering our dreams (so they come true),
Your Thanker Team!

Loading a video of our sponsors, so you will earn 10 extra Thankers!

When you thank someone, you thank the value of your Thanks (ie, if you give one Mega Thanks, it\'s worth 100 Thanks).\nAs for the Category, it count twice that value for the Primary Category of who you Thank, and once for the Secondary Category. This Category part is more visible on the Hall of Fame, or Daily Statistics, for example.
Click on each column to see the list of thanks!
Click on each column to see the lists of top Thankers (given, and received) !
If you\'re a Person account, you\'re Secondary Category can be related to your profession! ;)
Click any of the items below, so you can see all your Thanking stats! :)
Check Recent Interactions, Tops, Compatibilities, etc!
Explore the App, and Give Us Feedback! ;)

You have the opportunity to Live the Life You\'re Grateful For!\nHave in Thanker the possibility to thank and appreciate more, while knowing that Gratitude is one very important foundation of one\'s happinness!\nAlso, every time you Thank, you\'ll be earning Thankers! These will be really useful to give even more special Thanks!

Having Thankers will enable you to give more special Thanks. Every time you thank, you earn 1 Thanker.\nIn order to give a special Thanks like Super Thanks, you\'ll need to collect 10 Thankers. To give 1 Mega Thanks, you\'ll need 100 Thankers, and so on :)

In your profile, and in your friends\', you\'ll be able to see recent Thanks given and received, the top people and profiles that thank more each other, thanking compatibilities, etc.\nBy interacting more in Thanker, we\'ll let others know what we appreciate more, also letting people get to know us a little bit better, while we can do the same with them.\nUse Thanker to enhance the Gratitude and Relationship features of your life!

In the Menu (that mini picture of you that you\'ll see on the upper right corner), you\'ll find an option with Stats, that will enable you to check what people are thanking more in Thanker, by Country and Dates!

You earn Thankers every time you Thank. And there's a few more ways to earn more Thankers:
1) Invite Friends, while Thanking them. You'll find this option in the menu, and you can invite by e-mail or SMS. When they register, you'll earn 50 Thankers!
2) Watch Rewarded Videos: there's also an option in the Menu that will enable you to earn 10 Thankers for every time you watch a video from our sponsors!
3) Be a Premium User: by subscribing Premium, not only will you earn 150 Daily Thankers effortlessly, but you'll aos have the ability of saying "You're Welcome" to the Thanks received!

Feel free to, and please explore the app! The more you get to know it, the more benefit you\'ll gain from it!\nAlso, your feedback will be more than welcome! There\'s an option in the Menu so that you can send us your messages!\nLooking forward to hearing from you!

Use Thanker to Thank!
Thanking estimulates happinness, improves relationships, and increases self-esteem!
Visit your friends' pages and thank them there!

(1/5)
In the Menu you\'ll find the ability to invite Friends, see Stats, earn extra Thankers, etc! ;)\n\n(2/5)
Search for friends for their names or email. And when you find them, make sure you give the deserved Thanks, and also add them to your Friends list!\n\n(3/5)

Check the Hall of Fame to see who Thanks more in each category. Better yet, you become a Hall of Famer!
Looking forward to it! ;)

(4/6)
Become a Premium user, and earn 150 Thankers everyday, plus the ability to say \"You\'re Welcome\" to the Thanks you receive!\n\n(4/5)
Make the most of having and using Thanker! And let us know what you think, also on \"Contact Us\", in the Options Menu!\n\n(5/5)

You did it! Because your number of Thanks is a multiple of 10 000, that\'s exactly the bonus Thankers that you now earn! Congrats for that, and thank you so much for using Thanker! Remember, Gratitude is a foundation for increased happinness, and it surely must be practiced! Thank it up! Yours truly and always, Your Thanker Team!
We couldn\'t process your payment. Please try again!

Congratulations!
You are now Thanker Premium!
Thank you, and we hope it enhances your Thanker experience even more|
Let's keep in touch! Feel free to drop us lines through the "Contacts" option of the Menu! ;)
Oh Lord that lends me life, lend me a heart replete with thankfulness
Gratitude is the virtue of noble souls
Happy people remember the past with gratitude, they\'re joyful with the present, and face the future without fear
There is no excess in the world so commendable as excessive gratitude
How happy a person is depends upon the depth of his gratitude
Express gratitude with words and attitudes. Your life will greatly change, and very positively
Gratitude is the memory of the heart
To be happy is to find strength in forgiveness, hope in battles, safety in the stage of fear, love in mismatch. It is to thank God at every minute, for the miracle of Life
If we express Gratitude for what we have, we\'ll have more to feel Grateful for
Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom
We must find time to stop and thank the people who make a difference in our lives
Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some
When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around
We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures
Thankfulness is the quickest path to joy
Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary
Learn to be thankful for what you already have, while you pursue all that you want
Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it
The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness
There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle
Thank you for renewing!\nWe wish you an amazing and grateful experience with Thanker!
You\'ll find here some stats as soon as you Thank ;)
These are the top 3 categories your friend mostly thanks to!
